name: Misty's gym
author: Milliardo
notes:
Keeping it real with SSA. Tried a variety of decks and lost a promo, most decks werenâ€™t consistent at all...
The reason why SSA did well is because it destroys Amazoness, has a decent matchup vs Sylvans in general and also vs Masked heroes. 

I did play vs some Geargias, but Canadia and Abyss soldier deal with them. What can I say? Last month I KoGed with REZ, this month with SSA. Am 2 metas behind, just like Soup8?
